world.item

Class ItemStatTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.item.ItemStatTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseManager.DatabaseTable

    public class ItemStatTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseManager.DatabaseTable
    Contains the definition for a SQL table that holds the stats for different types of items. Does not hold the specific instances of each item, only the stats.
